_header: The man that I loved alderbest
_description: A Love Complaint, for two voices — six quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Wolde god that hyt were so / As I cowde wysshe bytuyxt vs too’

CULAdd5943.First Lines:
The man that I loued al ther bestIn al thys contre est other
                    westto me he ys a Strange gest…
CULAdd5943.Last Lines:
…he wold noȝt sey ones fare wellWen tyme was come that he
                    wold go
CULAdd5943.Note: Superscript feminine pronouns over the masculine ones.
